messages.message: I have a pretty big PR for fixing which buttons show up in the app view that needs to be backported: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/59746. I added a bunch of tests to derisk, but I just couldn't get the logic right without rewriting a bunch of stuff. Ideally Travis would review but he's out until next week. Can anyone help me out with the review?
i meant to take a look today, i’ll review rn!
it took a while since i got confused with all the prior logic as well, but i’m done reviewing!
Thanks Serena!! Hopefully it'll be a bit easier to parse now
I think the logic was simple to start and then it just kept getting more complicated until it was too complicated
